files.name: Clean.bat
files.content:
﻿:: chrome核浏览器垃圾清理批处理，放在userData目录
:: rd/s/q "Media Cache"2>NUL
del /s/q *.tmp
del /s/q *.bak
del /s/f/q "component_crx_cache\*"
del /s/f/q "extensions_crx_cache\*"
del /s/f/q "Crashpad\*"
del /s/f/q "GrShaderCache\*"
del /s/f/q "Guest Profile\*"
del /s/f/q "ShaderCache\*"
:: 取得当前批处理所在路径
:: cd /d %~dp0
cd Default
::del /s/f/q "Pepper Data\*"
del /s/f/q "Application Cache\*"
del /s/f/q "Media Cache\*"
del /s/f/q "Service Worker\CacheStorage\*"
for /d %%d in ("Service Worker\CacheStorage\*") do rd /s/q "%%d"
for /d %%d in ("Local Storage\http*") do rd /s/q "%%d"
for /d %%d in ("IndexedDB\http*") do rd /s/q "%%d"
del /s/f/q Cache\*
del /s/f/q GPUCache\*
::pause

files.name: README.md
files.content:
# uBlock Origin(以下简称UBO) 乘风广告过滤规则

仓库文件说明：
- `rule.txt`  乘风通用过滤规则，适用于UBO或ADG扩展。ADG for PC 不支持 scriptlet规则
- `mv.txt`    乘风视频过滤规则，适用于UBO或ADG扩展
- `git-config.txt`   github desktop 配置（.gitconfig文件，在C:\user\administrator目录），重点是代理配置
- `config.yaml`   clash不含代理的极简配置(不推荐用clash for windows)，存放于clash.exe所在目录。
load-balance 模式中round-robin策略的妙用：
![clash](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xinggsf/Adblock-Plus-Rule/master/clash.png)
- `Clean.bat`  chrome核浏览器清理批处理
- `ublock-dynamic-rule.txt`  UBO动态规则
- `v2ray.json`  v2rayN 配置

files.name: config.yaml
files.content:
# 不必用clash for windows! 单clash.exe即可！ 定位配置目录为clash.exe所在目录~创建快捷方式：clash.exe -d "."
# 同目录下还必须有二个文件：只包含中国IP信息GEOIP文件Country.mmdb ；proxys.yml（代理）
# port: 7890
socks-port: 7891
allow-lan: false
mode: Rule
log-level: info
# external-controller: 127.0.0.1:9090
tun:
  enable: false
  stack: system # or gvisor
  # dns-hijack:
  #   - 8.8.8.8:53
  #   - tcp://8.8.8.8:53
  auto-route: true # auto set global route
  auto-detect-interface: true # conflict with interface-name
dns:
  enabled: true
  nameserver:
    - 202.101.226.69
  # 提供 fallback 时，如果GEOIP非 CN 中国时使用 fallback 解析
  fallback:
    - tls://8.8.4.4:853 # cloudflare DNS over TLS
    # - tls://8.8.8.8:853 # Google DNS over TLS
    # - tls://1.0.0.1:853
    # - tls://dns.google:853
    - https://1.1.1.1/dns-query # cloudflare DNS over HTTPS
    - https://dns.google/dns-query # Google DNS over HTTPS
    # - tls://dns.rubyfish.cn:853 # DNS over TLS
proxies:
  - {name: jp_protocolbuffer, server: 45.64.22.55, port: 443, type: trojan, password: KLF0qOU0ZZGw5Tnu, sni: swift.protocolbuffer.com}
proxy-providers:
  learnhard:
    type: http
    url: https://raw.iqiq.io/learnhard-cn/free_proxy_ss/main/clash/clash.provider.yaml
    interval: 800
    path: learnhard.yaml
    health-check:
      enable: true
      interval: 600
      lazy: true
      url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
  subp: # 暂存代理信息
    type: file
    path: proxys.yml
    health-check:
      enable: true
      interval: 300
      url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
  goodp: # 响应快和速度快的
    type: file
    path: goodp.yml
    health-check:
      enable: true
      interval: 300
      url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
proxy-groups:
  - name: MV # 视频专用。网速快的
    type: load-balance # select url-test fallback
    use:
      - goodp
    url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
    interval: 50
    strategy: round-robin # consistent-hashing
  - name: UGG # 能通过谷歌和油管IP检测的
    type: url-test
    proxies:
      - jp_protocolbuffer
    url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
    interval: 90
  - name: UQUICK
    type: load-balance
    use:
      - goodp
      - subp
    url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
    interval: 50
    strategy: round-robin
  - name: UDOWNLOAD
    type: fallback
    proxies:
      - DIRECT
      - UQUICK
    url: http://www.gstatic.com/generate_204
    interval: 210
rules:
  - DOMAIN,hm.baidu.com,REJECT
  - PROCESS-NAME,IDMan.exe,UDOWNLOAD
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,onion,DIRECT
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,fastgit.org,DIRECT
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,cf,DIRECT
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,akamaized.net,DIRECT
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,t.me,UQUICK
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,w3schools.com,UQUICK
  - DOMAIN-KEYWORD,.reddit,UQUICK
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,aiosearch.com,UQUICK
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,ask.com,UQUICK
  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,startpage.com,UQUICK
